oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-11-12 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 12, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Carl Smith (host/performer), guest performer Martha Carson, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Dale Potter, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 30th anniversary of the Grand Ole Opry, and that the 4th annual DJ convention is taking place.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Del Wood; Minnie Pearl; Martha Carson; Chet Atkins; Carl Smith
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Rocky Mountain Express (Del Wood) [continued from part 1] -- Carl Smith introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Carl Smith introduces Martha Carson -- Lord I Can't Come Now (Martha Carson) -- Carl Smith introduces Chet Atkins -- Country Gentleman (Chet Atkins) -- Carl Smith talks -- I Feel Like Crying (Carl Smith) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Carl Smith) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Brasfield, Rod; Wood, Del; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Potter, Dale; Carson, Martha
